properties.name: hashicorp.vault.kvEnabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the Vault KV secrets engine.

properties.name: hashicorp.vault.authentication
properties.description: The authentication method to use when connecting to Vault.

properties.name: hashicorp.vault.token
properties.description: The Vault token to use when connecting to Vault.

properties.name: hashicorp.vault.scheme
properties.description: The scheme to use when connecting to Vault.

properties.name: hashicorp.vault.host
properties.description: The host to use when connecting to Vault.

properties.name: hashicorp.vault.port
properties.description: The port to use when connecting to Vault.

properties.name: azure.keyvault.vaultName
properties.description: The vault name to use when connecting to Azure Key Vault.

properties.name: azure.keyvault.vaultUri
properties.description: The vault URI to use when connecting to Azure Key Vault.
